author: The Film Theorists
description:
*✨Watch Creators in Fashion 2025 on our sister channel Style Theory! Live on October 9th at 7pm CST* ► https://www.youtube.com/@StyleTheorists

GLITCH Productions just launched a pilot of their new show “Knights of Guinevere,” and it has EVERYONE talking. And honestly, I was still left with a bunch of questions. Like why are people getting sick? What in the world is Blue Lung and how is it related to the parks? And how is DISNEY related to all this? Today’s episode will be answering all of these questions and more!

Special thanks for the following Discord pages and users:
https://www.reddit.com/r/KnightsOfGuinevere/ 
https://www.reddit.com/user/No-face-today/ 
‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐

Sound Designer: Yosi Berman, Alena Lecorchick

title: Film Theory: Knights of Guinevere Just EXPOSED Disney
